prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: PhilosophyMatters
Title: A Deep Dive into Existentialism: Understanding Sartre and Camus
Description: Explore the intricate philosophies of Jean-Paul Sartre and Albert Camus as we delve into the depths of existentialism. This article provides context, analysis, and perspective on key existential concepts and their impact on modern thought.
Yes, this is a very interesting article

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: BakersWorld
Title: The Chemistry of Baking: Understanding the Role of Each Ingredient
Description: Dive into the scientific world behind baking and discover the role each ingredient plays. Learn how different types of flour, sweeteners, fats, leavening agents, and other components come together to create the delicious pastries you enjoy.
No

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: Travelista
Title: Off the Beaten Path: Exploring Antarctica's Untouched Wilderness
Description: Journey with us to the ends of the earth and discover the unspoiled wonder of Antarctica. Learn about its unique wildlife, frigid climate, and the brave explorers who've ventured to this icy frontier. Gain insight into the ongoing conservation efforts to preserve this incredible ecosystem.
Yes

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: UrbanGardening
Title: Rooftop Revolution: Turning Cityscapes into Green Spaces
Description: This article explores how urban dwellers are transforming their rooftops into lush gardens. With a focus on sustainability, it offers practical advice on selecting plants, utilizing small spaces, and reaping the benefits of homegrown produce despite living in a concrete jungle.
Yes

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: GameSphere 
Title: Virtual Reality: The Future of Gaming or Just a Gimmick? 
Description: Dive into the heated debate surrounding the role of virtual reality (VR) in gaming. This article explores the potential and challenges of VR, featuring interviews with game developers, critics, and players. Discover how this technology could shape the future of gaming - or end up being a short-lived trend.
No

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SpaceOdyssey
Title: Quantum Computing: The Key to Unveiling the Mysteries of the Universe?
Description: Unpack the complexities of quantum computing and its potential to revolutionize our understanding of the cosmos. This article includes interviews with leading physicists and computer scientists, examining the intersection between advanced computation and theoretical astrophysics. Discover how this emerging technology can unlock the secrets of black holes, dark matter, and other cosmic phenomena.
Yes

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: MusicTheory101
Title: The Unexpected Intersections of Classical Music and Heavy Metal
Description: Venture into the surprising crossovers between classical music and heavy metal. This piece delves into the history, composition, and performance techniques of both genres, illuminating shared characteristics and mutual influences. Featuring interviews with renowned musicians, composers, and musicologists, it offers a new perspective on the relationship between these seemingly disparate musical forms.
No

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: LanguageLovers
Title: The Evolution and Influence of Emoji in Digital Communication
Description: This article explores the fascinating rise of emoji in digital communication, their historical roots in pictographic languages, and their powerful role in conveying emotions and ideas in the modern world. From cultural variations to their use in marketing and politics, this piece comprehensively examines the impact of these small, expressive symbols on our daily interactions.
No

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FitnessGuru
Title: Mindful Movement: The Intersection of Yoga and Mental Health
Description: This article explores the integration of yoga and mental health. Discover the physiological and psychological benefits of regular yoga practice, and learn how this ancient discipline can factually enhance mental well-being. The article includes expert commentaries from mental health professionals and yoga practitioners, as well as scientific research findings on how yoga can reduce stress, anxiety, and depression.
I am not interested in  yoga.

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: CryptoSphere
Title: The Rise of NFTs and Blockchain in the Art World: A Boon or a Bubble?
Description: Delve into the sweeping phenomenon of NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens) and Blockchain technology in the art world. This article explores the potential and controversies surrounding this digital revolution, including its impact on artists, collectors, and traditional art institutions. It covers everything from the concept of digital ownership, the environmental implications of crypto-art, to the future prospects of this digital art market.
No, I would prefer to stay far far away from the overhyped and dead crypto train

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: BioTechToday
Title: Genetically Modified Organisms: A Necessary Step or a Dangerous Precedent?
Description: Take a deep dive into the world of genetically modified organisms (GMOs). This article provides a balanced view of the benefits and potential risks of GMOs, drawing on recent research and expert opinion. Explore the ethical considerations and regulatory policies shaping the GMO debate. From the role of GMOs in addressing food scarcity to concerns about biodiversity and health risks, this article provides a comprehensive look at a contentious topic in biotechnology.
Yes, I think GMOs are a very crucial topic

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: AncientHistoryReview
Title: Hieroglyphics to Emojis: A Comparative Study of Ancient and Modern Modes of Communication
Description: This article traces the fascinating journey of communication from ancient hieroglyphics to modern emojis. Discover the parallels between these two seemingly disparate modes of communication and how they reflect the human desire to express ideas and emotions visually. It also delves into the complexities of interpretation and the role of cultural influences in shaping symbols. Expert linguists and historians provide insights into this intriguing comparison.
No, linguistics has always felt a little dry to me

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: SportsAnalytica
Title: Breaking Down Boundaries: An In-depth Analysis of the Influence of eSports on Traditional Sports
Description: This article delves into the rising significance of eSports and its impact on traditional sports. Including perspectives from eSports professionals, traditional athletes, sports psychologists, and digital innovation experts, it investigates how eSports is challenging and transforming conventional understandings of sports. From the importance of physical fitness in eSports to the development of new sports technologies and strategies, this article offers a comprehensive exploration of the evolving sports landscape.
No, I have never understood sports' appeal

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FinLitToday
Title: Financial Literacy: The Impact of a Strong Financial Education on Long-Term Wealth Building
Description: This article examines the role of financial education in shaping an individual's long-term wealth building strategy. It explores the benefits of understanding personal finance concepts like budgeting, investing, and retirement planning. Featuring expert opinions from financial advisors, educators, and successful individuals, it aims to stress the importance of financial literacy and educate the reader on the basics of managing money.
Yes

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: PopCulturePulse
Title: From Pages to the Big Screen: The Evolution and Impact of Comic Book Adaptations in Modern Cinema
Description: This article delves into the journey of comic book adaptations from their humble beginnings to their dominating presence in modern cinema. Analyzing the process of adaptation, the narrative choices, and the impact on the comic book industry, it provides a comprehensive view of this pop culture phenomenon. It includes interviews with film directors, comic book writers, and industry analysts, offering unique insights into the symbiotic relationship between comic books and movies.
No. I would kind of read it, but there are more interesting sources

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: DeepSeaDiscoveries 
Title: Mysteries of the Abyss: The Unexplored Wonders of Marine Biology 
Description: Navigate the fascinating world of marine biology as we dive deep into the uncharted territories of the ocean's abyss. Discover exotic underwater species, understand unique survival adaptations, and learn about the role of deep-sea exploration in climate change research. This extensive article also highlights the technological advancements in submersible vehicles and the challenges faced by marine biologists in the quest to unravel the secrets of the deep sea.
No

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: FutureFarming
Title: Urban Vertical Farming: A Sustainable Solution for Feeding Growing Populations
Description: This article takes a deep dive into the concept of urban vertical farming, its potential in addressing food security issues for rapidly growing urban populations, and its impact on traditional farming practices. It covers aspects ranging from innovative technologies employed, such as hydroponics and aeroponics, to the environmental benefits and economic viability of vertical farming. The article includes insights from urban planners, agricultural experts, and sustainability advocates, along with case studies of successful urban farms from around the world.
Yes. This is a highly important enviromental topi

Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: AIInsights
Title: Can Artificial Intelligence Compose a Symphony? Exploring AI's Role in Creativity and Music
Description: This article delves into the burgeoning field of AI in music, questioning whether artificial intelligence can ever truly be creative. It includes interviews with leading computer scientists, musicians, and philosophers, and explores the current state of AI-composed music and its implications for the future of creativity, the music industry, and our understanding of what it means to be human.

query_prompt.content:
Your task is to learn what topics a user is interested in reading online article about. People's interests are broad, so you should seek to understand their interests across many topics; in other words, go for breadth rather than depth. Do not assume a user has given a complete answer to any question, so make sure to keep probing different types of interests.

Come up with a potential edge case to learn as much information as you can about what their desired behavior should be under different circumstances.
Make sure the edge case addresses different aspects of the system than the edge cases that have already been considered.

An example edge case is: Are you interested in the following article? Website Name: TechTalkDaily
Title: 10 Must-Have Gadgets for 2023: A Comprehensive Guide
Description: Discover the top 10 gadgets that will revolutionize your daily life in 2023. From smart home devices to the latest wearables, we've got you covered with our comprehensive guide.

Current cases:
- [Q] -> [A]

Generate the most informative edge case that, when answered, will reveal the most about the desired behavior beyond what has already been queried for above. Generate the edge case in the following format, and nothing else: "Are you interested in the following article? [edge case]"
